Centre for Military Airworthiness and Certification
FORM - 44
DEFECT INVESTIGATION REPORT FORMAT
In accordance with IMTAR – 21, Subpart C1, 21.C1.18, Subpart C2, 21.C2.9 & Subpart C3, 21.C3.1.20.
Part - I (Reference): Incident /Accident/ Snag / Explosive
a) Defect Report (DR) No: DR/2021/0786 b) Date of Occurrence: 19/01/2024
c) Installation Details: Cobra Advanced - AC-1946-705 at
Maintenance Hub-Y
Part - II: (Details of Defective Component)
a) Trade: Electrical b) Date Component 28/01/2024
Received:
c) System/Sub System: Power Distribution d) Main Assembly: Pylon-C
e) Nomenclature: Power Distribution Assembly Unit f) MOD Status: MOD-D
g) Part No.: EL-7821-O5 h) Sl No.: SN-6624-161
i) Firmware Version: FW-7.28.244 j) Software Version: Not Applicable
k) Date of Installation: 23/09/2023 l) Date of Removal: 25/01/2024
Pg No: 99 Ln No: 20 Pg No: 29 Ln No: 12
m) Manufacturing Agency: Vertex Aeronautics n) Date, Month & Year September 2017
of Manufacturing:
o) Whether under warranty: Yes p) Whether under AMC No
/ Repair Contract:
q) Life completed since New: 1757 Hrs / 1212 Cycles

--- Page 2 (pdf_text) ---
Centre for Military Airworthiness and Certification
FORM - 44
DEFECT INVESTIGATION REPORT FORMAT
Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Mission Critical
b) Defect Observed: Connector corrosion causing signal degradation. Defect found during scheduled
maintenance.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Contamination ingress through damaged seal assembly
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Power Distribution component.
Functional testing confirmed the reported anomaly.
c) Remedial Measures Repair damaged area using approved repair scheme
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Establish periodic calibration schedule
d) Attributable Code: NFF - No Failure Found
Remarks: Investigation completed as per established procedures. All findings documented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Detailed analysis indicates design margins are adequate. Failure attributed to operational factors. Concur with findings.
Date: 12/02/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Air Cmde S.B. Rao

--- Page 3 (pdf_text) ---
Centre for Military Airworthiness and Certification
FORM - 44
DEFECT INVESTIGATION REPORT FORMAT
Part VI: Remarks by Quality Dept.
Quality aspects reviewed. Manufacturing process controls are adequate. Recommend supplier quality audit.
Date: 14/02/2024 Signature: Sqn Ldr H.S. Bhatia
Part VII: Remarks by User(Project):(if applicable)
Operational usage reviewed. Component operated within prescribed limits. Concur with investigation outcome.
Date: 13/02/2024 Signature: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair
Part VIII: Remarks by ORDAQA (Quality Aspects)
Quality assurance framework assessed. Investigation process followed established protocols. Findings are valid.
Date: 15/02/2024 Signature: Air Cmde R.K. Joshi
Part IX: Remarks by CEMILAC / RCMA (Design Aspects)
Certification review completed. Proposed modifications do not affect type design approval. Acceptable.
Date: 17/02/2024 Signature: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel
Edition Number: 1.0 Form Version Number: 1.0 Date: January 2021
